metadata.title: Matias Bacelar
metadata.description: Matias Bacelar is a front-end focused software developer who likes to build interfaces & digital experiences for the web.

title.second: a front-end focused software developer who likes to build interfaces & digital experiences for

content.text: I am a self-taught developer from La Plata (Buenos Aires) with a focus on Javascript & React. I have an interest in micro interactions and effects in the UI as well as creating user experiences that are dynamic and interactive.

I started programming for fun a few years ago and without realizing it, programming became a hobby and now a profession. I enjoy building interfaces that are useful without losing the aesthetics of the application as I believe that usability and aesthetics are equally important.
These are some of the technologies that I normally use for my personal projects and professionally:

info.firstItem: Website for the SPB Circle of Officers with the React ecosystem, the most important features were custom form validation, storing data in firebase, custom maps and animations.
info.secondItem: Application called Tiendas platenses that give users the ability to search for different products and contact the specific seller of that product.

info.firstItem: Developed and mantained code for the company software (Collaborative E-sourcing platform) with React and his ecosystem.
info.secondItem: Develop the landing page of the company with Next JS, I used the Internationalized Routing functionality to have translations in English, Spanish and Portuguese as well as adding animations using framer motion.

info.firstItem: Developed a dynamic map report builder using Next JS, using server and client components, next-js API for endpoint creation and the Puppeteer library.
info.secondItem: Developed a dynamic map report builder where i utilice different Mapbox services (Mapbox Static Image API, Mapbox Tiling Service) for generating a series of maps with dynamic custom heatmaps.

projects.name: Snapcode
projects.info: Snapcode is an application to create code snippets, download, save and delete them using GitHub as authentication provider & Supabase.

projects.name: Moderne
projects.info: Moderne is an app for a fictional high tech property construction company, in this project the focus is on animations using both Framer Motion and CSS.

projects.name: Portfolio v1
projects.info: First version of my portfolio build with Next JS (SSG) in the frontend and and Strapi CMS as a backend.

footerSection.title: Let’s talk   +
footerSection.message: If you want to contact me to ask me something my inbox is always open.
